input.sentences: all of the ingredients are prepared .
we have the clams ready to be eaten with limes .
we even have asparagus cooked and prepared .
time to open op some wine for the meal .
the kids only get apple juice unfortunately .
output.sentences: We got ready for the family dinner by preparing the food.
The limes and oysters were ready and looked delicious.
We also had asparagus, my favorite veggies.
Joe opened the champagne to make a toast.
The kids got juice, though, instead of champagne.
